sentences.en: After graduating from Cornell with a degree in ornithology in 1932, he went to work, at $17 a week, for Margaret Bourke-White, developing film and assisting on location.
sentences.cn: 1932年从康奈尔拿到鸟类学学位毕业之后，他开始工作。 起初周薪只有17块钱，为玛格丽特伯克怀特做事，开拍电影以及预订场地。

sentences.en: Birders often plan travel to festivals to see more birds and they may take photography or basic ornithology classes to expand their knowledge and enjoyment of the hobby.
sentences.cn: 鸟人们常常计划参与观鸟节旅行以便看到更多的鸟，他们也可能会上一些摄影或者基础鸟类学的课程来帮助扩展他们的知识并让观鸟这个爱好更加有趣。

sentences.en: Birds communicate by songs, and avian vocalization is a main aspect of ornithology.
sentences.cn: 鸟类鸣声是鸟类交流的“语言”, 也是鸟类学研究的主要内容之一.

sentences.en: Botany, Entomology Herpetology, mammalogy, and ornithology.
sentences.cn: 收藏植物学 、 虫学、虫学 、 乳动物学和鸟类学.

sentences.en: He found his vocation in ornithology.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己适于专攻鸟类学.
